name: vscode-integrator
description: Automated DevContainer and VS Code configuration generator

scripts.build:binary:linux: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output binaries/vscode-integrator-linux
scripts.build:binary:macos: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output binaries/vscode-integrator-macos
scripts.build:binary:macos-arm: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output binaries/vscode-integrator-macos-arm
scripts.build:binary:windows: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output binaries/vscode-integrator-win.exe
scripts.build:binary:all: npm run build:binary:linux && npm run build:binary:macos && npm run build:binary:macos-arm && npm run build:binary:windows
